newsitem.title: LEBANON: Israeli planes strike in south Lebanon.
newsitem.headline: Israeli planes strike in south Lebanon.

text.p: Israeli warplanes raided on Sunday suspected Hizbollah guerrilla targets in southeast Lebanon, security sources said.
They said two jets fired in three swoops a total of six rockets into hills overlooking Hizbollah-held Mashghara village just north of Israel's south Lebanon occupation zone.
There was no immediate word on casualties or damage in the raid.
Earlier on Sunday the pro-Iranian guerrillas wounded an Israeli soldier and hit a Merkava tank in a rocket attack against an Israeli patrol on a road inside the 15 km (nine mile) wide zone.
